mapper.update: update usertable set companyid = #{companyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, companyname = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isonline = #{isonline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mail = #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, companyid, companyname, isonline, tel, mail from usertable
